类型: Color: Black belt black shell blue mirror
评论详情: What should you expect for $30? Not much. This is a GREAT LOOKING watch. As for quality workmanship...not so much. I'm in the midst of returning my third--and last-OLEVS watch. I bought my first one on Amazon on 6/7/21. It worked fine and got me a lot of compliments...until the hands came off and just flopped around inside the dial casing. Yes, you can remove the back of this watch to replace the battery. But without watchmaker's tools, there was no way to get underneath the crystal to try to re-attach the hands. So, I ordered watch #2 on 8/7/23. That one lasted just over a year until--you guessed it--the hands came off once again! I shoulda' known that if watch #1 lasted a little over two years, and watch #2 lasted a little over one year, I was trending toward watch #3 being a piece of junk. And, I was right. Watch #3, ordered on 9/18/24 (and which, with multiple shipping delays, didn't arrive until 9/26/24) worked intermittently and then, on 9/29/24, stopped working altogether. It's headed back to Amazon and I'll have my full credit soon.  I was willing to invest $30.00 for two years of a great looking watch. I figured watch #2 was an anomaly, since it only lasted just over one year. But watch #3--with a lifespan of about four days--cinched it. These are junk and the quality is obviously going down year after year.  I'm giving it two stars instead of one because it's truly a classy, elegant looking, non-ostentatious watch (until the hands come off or it completely stops working). Now if the Chinese manufacturer could just figure out how to make it work as well as it looks...

类型: Color: Black belt black shell blue mirror
评论详情: I like watches and have about 20 in my "collection".  Some I have paid as much as $400 for.  After just "working" reliably, I am primarily interested in "looks".  I think this watch is gorgeous.  I have worn it continuously for several months now.  I love how thin it is.  It is keeping time well.  No signs of wear.  And, less than $30!. From many years of experience, I am still puzzled how "they" can make a watch for $30 that seems to be, in every way, just as good as a $400 watch.  I immediately threw away the "leather" band and purchased a black mesh band - slipped on very easily (22mm, I think).  I paid almost as much for the band as I did for the watch!  I love mesh bands because they are attractive, continuously adjustable, sturdy, and easy to put on and remove.

评论概述: Gorgeous! But if that band is brown/tan...
评论详情: ...apparently whoever picks the bands for this watch has the same color-blindness as our liar-in-chief, Mr. Oompa Loompa. The 'brown' watchband is, what I would conservatively call, "pumpkin orange". No matter, I decided to upgrade the band anyway, paired with a beautiful Stainless Steel black 'Milanese Mesh' band! Less than $60 for both combined equals a package that I have been told looks like 10x that. Also note that the ultra-this 6.5 mm is only around the outer rim, it is twice that in the middle. But the illusion works. For the price, it has kept impeccable time and sparkles like a watch in the four figure range. I am going to grab a few more as gifts before they figure it out and increase the price! HONEST REVIEW. Get one. I was impressed. Just plan on replacing the cheap band.
